mapper.update: update t_sinker_topo set sinker_name = #{sinkerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sinker_conf = #{sinkerConf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jar_id = #{jarId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.sinker_name, t.sinker_conf, t.jar_id, t.status, t.description, t.update_time, j.name jar_name ,j.path jar_path from t_sinker_topo t join t_topology_jar j on t.jar_id = j.id
